response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it is valued at $15,000 by many. However, I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a discounted rate. I believe this offer presents a significant advantage for you, considering the immense value the product holds for you personally. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
